## Source: amazon-inspector (bdd5f17df1d0a4a9093ad436f4dafa59a288c2c650f7f1dff5cd36af67b5e98f)
The package karemm2 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4b8bdcb09150b560d85e5ddba2a0f76f1f26e6a330c437c93d4cd8b7560a2d28)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'karemm2' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
